1356950.name: Edentopia
1356950.description:
Embark on an epic adventure in a vast, open world crafting game where the power of magic is yours to wield. Collect and craft new spells as you explore the world, discovering rare and valuable items to aid you in your journey. Battle unique bosses and expand your base to build a thriving community. With endless possibilities for customization and exploration, every playthrough is a unique and thrilling experience.

Features

  • Open World Sandbox: Build your base, transform the lands and setup your own village anywhere and in anyway you like!

  • Action Oriented Progression: Battle foes in real-time, craft weapons to your liking, learn magic spells from secret Mentors, recruit mercenaries aiding you in battles, guard yourself with a bunch of pet sheeps, spawn spirit minions or even build villages around your enemy, your only limit is your imagination!

  • Master the arcane arts: Build your own class. Use an evolving Active Skill Tree to master close quarters, magic, or range. Every ability is a building block to combine however you want. If you hit a wall, reconfigure your entire tree in town at any time. Your character isn't a choice you make at the start. It’s a build you refine as you play.

  • Explore Edentopia: A world filled with mysteries and rich in fantastical beings. Meet those who roam the lands before you and learn more about the lore and history of Edentopia but beware of viscous conquerers that roam the lands, they will guard you from their secrets!

  • Recruit villagers and expand your village! Bring some villagers or adventurers home to your base and they will be ready in your service right at home.

  • Craft-Up: Progress by crafting equipment and enchanting weapons, craft from monster parts to ores you find along the way on your journey.

  • Heal and buff up through farming and cooking! Restore your health and enhance your abilities by preparing delicious food and brewing potent potions. Higher-quality dishes grant stronger buffs and maximizing Health, so cultivate fruit farms, manage farm animals, and fish to gather the freshest ingredients!

  • XBOX Controller Support: Utilize twin stick playstyle, or traditional top-down joypad style with auto-aiming support toggle. (auto-aim works with mouse and keyboard playstyle)
